summary: Needs a lil' bit of work, but hey, it's my first mod.
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can't buy the spell books at any merchant, but this is your option on obtaining them.

Open console by pressing ~ and type in - "Help Dubstep"(Without ") to show the code/id list.
Then just do
player.additem [id] 1
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music list:
1. Dubsidia - Kill humans(Dirtyloud Remix)
2. SRIV - Christmas Time
3. Excision & Datsik - Vindicate
4. Sweedish House Mafia - Save the world (Knife Party Remix)
5. Flux Pavilion - Blow The Roof
6. Daft Punk - Robot Rock (Alex S. Remix)
7. Avicii - Levels
8. Astronaut - Apollo
9. xKore - Need You (feat. Zoe & Naomi) (Centra Remix)
10. Skrillex - Bangarang
11. Skrillex - Sick Bubblegum
12. Skrillex - Kyoto
13. Skrillex & Knife Party - Rage Syndicate (Alejandro Vallecillo Bootleg)
14. Blackmill - Lucid Truth
15. TechnoAxe - Beat Time Grime
16. Skrillex - I'mma Try It Out
17. Figure - Dominate
18. Scout MacMillan - Polyhymnia
19. Sporty-O - Let Me Hit it
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Due to me not being able to play it at the moment, I won't be able to update this for quite some time. Sorry for the inconvenience.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: DiskScratch
